entry.title: Russia will help Armenia build up its army, says Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov

media:group.media:description:
๐France and the US have not been cooperating with Russia as OSCE Minsk Group Co-Chairs in order to find a resolution to the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict, says Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov. ๐Tech giant NVIDIA has opened a research center in Armenia. ๐Armenia did not take part in a United Nations vote on Thursday to suspend Russia from the bodyโs Human Rights Council.

entry.title: Azerbaijanโs grand strategy to ethnically cleanse Karabakh Armenians

media:group.media:title: Azerbaijanโs grand strategy to ethnically cleanse Karabakh Armenians
media:group.media:description:
Political scientist Irina Ghaplanyan talks to CivilNetโs Emilio Cricchio about the situation in Nagorno-Karabakh and Azerbaijanโs grand strategy of โcreepingโ ethnic cleansing. Dr. Ghaplanyan also discusses Armeniaโs mistakes in the 2020 Nagorno-Karabakh war, the importance of using international legal instruments like the International Court of Justice, and why holding Armenian prisoners of war for over two years has turned out to be a tactical mistake for Azerbaijan.

entry.title: ิฟีกีดีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ึ ีฃีถีธึีด ีง ีซีถีฟีฅีฃึีพีฅีฌ, ีกีทีญีกีฟีฅีฌ ึ ีกีบึีฅีฌ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด

media:group.media:title: ิฟีกีดีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ึ ีฃีถีธึีด ีง ีซีถีฟีฅีฃึีพีฅีฌ, ีกีทีญีกีฟีฅีฌ ึ ีกีบึีฅีฌ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด
media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ ีฟีฅีฒีกึีธีญีพีกีฎ ีฐีกีตีฅึีซ ีธึ ึ ีฟีกึีฅึีฏึีกึีซีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฃีธึีฎีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฏีกีดีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีซ ึีกีถีซ ีฎึีกีฃึีฅึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีธีน ีดีซีกีตีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึ ีฃีฟีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีฅีถ ีฟีกีฌีซีฝ, ีกีตีฌึ ึ ีฃีถีธึีด ีฅีถ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีฌีกีพ ีฎีกีถีธีฉีกีถีกีฌ ีฅึีฏึีซีถ, ีดีทีกีฏีธึีตีฉีซีถ ึ ีฝีธีพีธึีฅีฌ ีฌีฅีฆีธึีถึ ิฑีตีคีบีซีฝีซ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีฅีถ ยซิดีฅีบีซ ีีกีตึยป (Birthright Armenia), ยซีีกีต ีฏีกีดีกีพีธึีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป (AVC) ึ ยซีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีกีทีญีกีฟีธึีด ีง ีฑีฅีฆ ีฐีกีดีกึยป ีฎึีกีฃึีฅึีจึ

entry.title: Armenia and Azerbaijan agree to prepare for peace treaty

media:group.media:title: Armenia and Azerbaijan agree to prepare for peace treaty
media:group.media:description:
Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev agreed on Wednesday to direct their respective foreign ministries to begin preparing a peace treaty, according to a statement by European Council President Charles Michel, who hosted the two leaders in Brussels. The Armenian and Azerbaijani leaders also agreed to convene a joint commission to delimit their border.
